message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need $16000 to make it worth my while.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I have to stay within my budget.
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a bit of a concession. I'm willing to meet you at $15500, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but $15500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14500, which is the highest I can go. Can you meet me at this price?
